title.rendered: Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience the Deputy Chief Observer of EU Observation Mission (Nigeria 2023)

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience the Deputy Chief Observer of EU Observation Mission (Nigeria 2023), Mr. Thomas Boserup and his team today, 27th June, 2023.
The EU Observers final Report on Nigeria’s 2023 General Elections was presented to the Permanent Secretary. The team was accompanied to the Ministry by Amb. Samuela Isopi, Head of EU Delegation to Nigeria.
